p.i: Write a Python function that meets the following specification:

text.pre: def value_count(d, x): """ d, a dictionary that maps integers to integers x, an integer Returns how many times x occurs as a value in d """
text.p: For example, if d = {1:2, 2:4, 3:2, 9:2} and x = 2, then value_count(d, x) returns 3.
Enter your definition for the function. Click the blue Submit button to make sure that you copied your code correctly and that it passes our basic tests.
